snippet: After living in foster care and with various relatives, Jewella Jarrett was confronted with a choice: support her mother, who has bipolar disorder and was threatened by a violent ex-boyfriend, or finish high school.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services provides support for Jewella Jarrett of Bedford Stuyvesant, who has struggled to get an education while caring for her bipolar mother and her sister.
lead_paragraph: After living in foster care and with various relatives, Jewella Jarrett was confronted with a choice: support her mother, who has bipolar disorder and was threatened by a violent ex-boyfriend, or finish high school.

headline.main: Standing With Family, Even if It Hurts
headline.print_headline: Standing With Family, Even if It Hurts

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
